website_summaries.verdict: If you're tired of aromatherapy candles with barely-there scents, this potent option won't disappoint. Ideal for large rooms or a whole-house effect.
pros: A concentrated blend of eucalyptus and spearmint essential oils deliver a powerful, stress-relieving aroma that fills the whole room and beyond
Soy-based wax construction is long-burning and non-toxic
Comes in a transparent glass holder with a lid
cons: If you have a sensitive nose, this one might be too strong

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals, not eucalyptus.
customer_reviews.text: Acerbic, unpleasant, probably artificial smell. I have eucalyptus essential oil that I love, and this is entirely different. I burned it for a couple hours, hoping that the chemical smell would burn off, but it smelled horrible the whole time. I'm really bummed because I really like both these herbs, but whatever this is, it's not those smells. I had to trash it. I wouldn't give this to an enemy. Well ... maybe if I actually had an enemy, I would.
customer_reviews.author: TravisFW

customer_reviews.title: The candle I received isnt even the same brand of ...
customer_reviews.text: The candle I received isnt even the same brand of candle. It came broken and covered in dirt and dust
customer_reviews.author: A. Cesario

customer_reviews.title: Glass was broken when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: The glass around the candle was shattered when I opened the box. They literally put my candle and another item I ordered into the box with a single air bubble for packing. Anyone could tell by looking at the setup that the candle wasn’t going to make it... I read a lot of reviews saying the candle was broken when it arrived but I ignored them. So beware! However, the candle has a wonderful smell and you can tell it is a high quality candle! The stress relief scent is one of my favorites. Also, customer service was very nice to me when I called and explained my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My favorite candle!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the home stretch of completing my master’s degree, and right now I’m being held together by thisand the. I’m not even kidding. This candle doesn’t give off the cloying, artificial scent that so many others do. Also, despite the fact that I find a burning candle relaxing, it’s not necessarily a “sleepy” scent; it helps my mind stay sharp. Study breaks usually find me enjoying this while playing the rim of my singing bowl, so I can maintain that clarity and single-pointed focus I need right now. The candle burns evenly, and the bowl is well made, so I’m confident they’ll see me through to the end.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyhernandez080577

customer_reviews.title: strong spa aroma
customer_reviews.text: This is the best candle I've tried in terms of producing the fragrance I want and filling a space with it. Very spa like because of the eucalyptus. It is a STRONG smelling candle. It might be overwhelming for some people who are looking for a more subtle scent. I need something to fill my whole house and this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great smell; good for insomniacs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle to help me sleep better at night and it has worked wonderfully. The eucalyptus smell is great and doesn't leave an unpleasant scent when it permeates into the bedsheets and pillows. It takes about 10 minutes to fill a 400 square foot room with the scent. The three wicks really improve the speed at which the scent is dispersed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mai

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very powerful scent, not for use in small spaces. Very relaxing scent. I go into immediate zen mode as soon as I light this thing. It doesn't take long after lighting for the scent to fill the room. This is the kind of candle you can burn for a coupe hours, close it and still appreciate the scent for a while after.
customer_reviews.author: C. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: B&BW 3 wick aroma therapy candle, eucalyptus & spearmint
customer_reviews.text: What I love with their candles by Bath & Body Works is the clean burn. Gentle yet clearly "there" smell you get. LONG lasting and good even burn. This particular candle is a favorite scent from them for me. More natural, yet strong enough to really clean a room out with delicious scent. Not a fan of the stronger flowery types or sugary sweet types. This is my absolute favorite one! So glad I found it, reduced from buying it alone in the stores. Decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting, great smelling!
customer_reviews.text: These are the bomb! We have (too many) cats and these are very long-lasting and permeate the entire house with a delicious fragrance! We've bought three different scents and will continue to buy these. There is nothing we've found that is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love bath and body works candles! They are so much better than Yankee. Yankee does not have very good throw at all. Especially for price. I can put one bath and body works candle in my living room and smell it from every corner! Also this event is truly relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Torri Rose

customer_reviews.title: I want this scent to run through my veins.
customer_reviews.text: I usually would not pay 20 dollars for a candle. But this one is so worth it. The stress relief scent from aroma therapy runs through my veins. I’m OBSESSED with it. Like dangerously obsessed with it. I want my whole LIFE to smell like this scent. It is SO CALMING AND SO BEAUTIFUL. You need to buy this candle and every other product from this line. It’s a bit expensive so I have to wait a while until I can afford another one. BUT I AM OBSESSED WITH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, clean burning, strong scented candle.
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells absolutely fantastic. I love that the scent fills our entire bedroom. It smells great and the scent lasts a long time. We light it and shut the door, and within 15 minutes, the whole room (approximately 15'x15') smells amazing. Absolutely love this candle. It burns clean and even every time and it is truly stress-relieving! Even after it's been blown out, the room continues to smell like eucalyptus spearmint for a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Rugbychic216

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure they found me a used candle in the garbage and tried to sell it to me.
customer_reviews.text: The candle I received looks used and damaged, as if they went dumpster diving behind a Bath & Body Works and then tried to sell it to me. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Whitener

customer_reviews.title: This didn't smell like eucalyptus or spearmint to me?
customer_reviews.text: This didn't smell like eucalyptus or spearmint to me? I thought it smelled like a typical, generic scented candle you'd maybe find at Marshall's on a bad day, but gave it 3 stars because the girls in the office said I was crazy and they loved it (although no one thought it smelled like eucalyptus or spearmint), so maybe I'm being too harsh? Anyway, returned it without any hassle which I appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: inforshoe

customer_reviews.title: No value
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this is a drop shipper selling on here. I could have stopped by Bath & Body Works and got the same product for half the price. In addition, its more like a fragrance rather than a eucalyptus smell. Never buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: It was broke when I received it. What's worse is that it didn't break in the box which means someone broke it and then packed it Into the holding box. :/ it cut my hand pretty bad. I'm going to try to put it into a different holder.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vozzola

customer_reviews.title: Default Product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite scented candles - very zen and relaxing. Unfortunately this one arrived with a defected wick (too short) therefore I can’t light it without digging into the wax and it burning unevenly. I do love it but would love to connect with the seller as it is a pricier candle.
customer_reviews.author: ClaudiaR

customer_reviews.title: Gross smell.
customer_reviews.text: This candle smelled awful. Nothing like spearmint and eucalyptus. Smells more like an overly perfumed taxi crossed with a rest stop bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed candle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this candle. I know it was a reject candle. It was advertised as a flaw packaging. I sent to a friend as a surprise. I was surprised, paid over $15 for a candle that was 3/4 burned out. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candle came out of the glass
customer_reviews.text: You are taking a chance with ordering a candle online. I took a chance against my better judgement. The candle came in a dirty glass, the bottom label was scratched and some words I couldn’t even read. To top it off.. the entire candle came out of the case when I flipped it gently upside down to read the bottom label!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy - poor shipping and not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite candles, but like another reviewer mine only had two wicks (3rd was buried in the wax). The bigger issue is that the product looks really banged up. There are smears and smudges all over the lid and outside. The candle isn’t packaged tightly so the candle separated from the bottom inside the glass. Not really what you expect to get for the price of a candle like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Strong lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: By the look of the item I thought it was going to be a very generic candle I did not even notice it was a stress relief candle lol I just wanted eucalyptus. The smell is very strong but I really enjoy that strong scent that lingers in a room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: The package came in looking like it was thrown and kicked around. When I opened the box I was relieved to find the candle still in the glass, glass not broken, lid off, and a thin layer of wax all over the inside of the box. Wax was easy to wash off and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Mittsy Kessler

customer_reviews.title: I love eucalyptus essential oils so I thought I love this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love eucalyptus essential oils so I thought I love this but it’s awful. The smell gives me a headache and it doesn’t smell like a real eucalyptus scent whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first whiff was pretty good, then I lit it and the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: The first whiff was pretty good, then I lit it and the smell was over powering and WAY too strong. I think this thing could give too much aroma to a coliseum. Ick.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a LOT of candles. This is the best. Not a low budget item by any means but I use it anyway. Scent lasts after the candle is out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you like a beautiful set of smell
customer_reviews.text: Really nice smelling candle I’m not too strong but certainly feels a couple rooms with ease of a pleasant aroma. I love this candle
customer_reviews.author: ReneeB

customer_reviews.title: Very small wick
customer_reviews.text: I received this product the other day and it was incredibly disappointing. When I opened it the wick was not tall enough to light. I had to take a knife and dig down enough to find a wick. Because of this the wax keeps melting and covering the wick which then extinguishes it. For over $18 I would expect a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Ballou

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a strong smell. So make sure you like it before you buy. But once you do, this is by far the most fragrant, longest lasting candle I've ever burned. And i usually have a scented candle burning. It's not the longest lasting burn, but not the slowest either - burn time is perfectly medium.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Standerford

customer_reviews.title: Came broken :(
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the candle came broken into a million pieces. I can’t really return it. Not sure how it even got like that because it was packaged within another box but there was no bubble wrap inside so I don’t know. Definitely disappointed. Tried to salvage the candle but their is tiny bits of glass so best to be safe and throw it away. I’ll take a loss. Product was shipped quickly and the scent is wonderful though...always a positive after a negative.
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE Florida

customer_reviews.title: Stinks so bad I have a terrible headache.
customer_reviews.text: This candle stunk up a 3 level hose in 5 minutes. If you want a headache buy this and burn it. The smell is so strong I can’t stand it. That’s hardly therapy as far as I’m concerned.
customer_reviews.author: David Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Aromatherapy Eucalyptus spearmint hand soap so was excited ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Aromatherapy Eucalyptus spearmint hand soap so was excited to receive this candle. It is not a powerful scent, but is a noticeable refreshing scent when you walk into a room. The candle completely melts each time you light all of the fuses and the oils seem to be a little less fragrant with each burn. It is about halfway done after about 20 hours of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Prazak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last as long as I had hoped but that probably because I love this product so much! Definitely a good aromatherapy candle for big rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: And the dreamy smile started to spread across my face
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought I was going to be disappointed with this candle, if only because some of mine are exceedingly strongly scented, but after this one burns for a few minutes, that eucalyptus-spearmint scent really starts to spread throughout the house. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE CANDLE
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite candle, This candle smells amazing and did not put off too much smoke. I have had candles set off our smoke detectors in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Fake candle?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bath and body works candles for a long time in my night stand. They usually last between 2-3 months. This is my first time buying it online and I’m very disappointed. The label isn’t the same as the picture. It has been only 2 weeks and the candle is already half way gone.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Nasciutti

customer_reviews.title: My fave!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite candle in the whole world. I have no idea what I'd do in life without these candles
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Relax, renew, and now do with this aromatherapy candle
customer_reviews.text: I love this fresh smelling candle. It burns clean and I feel so relaxed and renewed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever.
customer_reviews.text: Use a candle warmer and it'll last forever. The scent is amazing. Tons of compliments in the office.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Gravitt

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite candle from this company. It's not always easy to find this scent but when I can get it I'm never disappointed. It makes my whole apartment smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why these are so priced up for a eh size. Went to T.J Maxx to get one with the exact same smell but way bigger and way cheaper. My mom loved this one though so I guess that a plus. A smile is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Lovely familiar scent
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent...but always so expensive. Learned my lesson trying to buy a knock-off, though. I really preferred them in the green glass container, though.
customer_reviews.author: BethGA

customer_reviews.title: Need more!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great and really is stress relieving. Something about the smell of eucalyptus or spearmint that makes a body release tension and relax. They last quite a while, I've used it for about an hour everyday for 30 days. I still have a little bit left. I've also bought other brands of these, but this brand, specifically, lasts long and actually seems to work. It works in large living rooms, so that's another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rijvi Rajib

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: If these candles weren't so expensive, I'd buy them all of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Barr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this candle. She says it's very soothing and aromatic.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Decent candle strong bland soapy smell
customer_reviews.text: Nice candle. When you light it..it tends to have a very strong heavy soapy smell. I can't handle it for very long and not sure how it helps with stress and actually started giving me a little headache till I got used to the smell
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scent is great, but it's not the green glass it's a cheaper clear glass.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite scented candle. Not real strong. Very relaxing to your senses. Great price. Cheaper than store. I love that the scent lingers long after the candle is out. Some may not care for that. Lasts for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No tricks here
customer_reviews.text: This is the real thing and it's a great scent at that. I bought this on amazon not realizing you could still buy it in the store. Either way- amazon sells it for the sale price and it's the exact same thing so you dont even have to leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Clawre30

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a Bath and Body Works product but seems fake. Candle has never had a scent to it.
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not too sickly sweet or heavy
customer_reviews.text: Fresh, clean scent that lasts a long time. Not too sickly sweet or heavy, which I'm not a fan of. I wouldn't normally spend $20 on a candle, but this one is still going strong and I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scent I received a gift from a staff last Xmas n I loved it so much that I had to rebuy for me again
customer_reviews.author: Tia RaniAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MAKES THE WHOLE HOUSE SMELL AMMMMAZING
customer_reviews.text: •MY FAVORITE CANDLE •SATURATES THE WHOLE HOUSE WITH EUCALYPTUS •SUCH STRESS RELIEF AROMA
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS SWEISS

customer_reviews.title: I love the candle because it makes the room smell nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this scent, I get everything possible in it! I love the candle because it makes the room smell nice even when it's not lit.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: NOT Green Glass Version
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The only reason I purchased this was because I was under the impression it was the green glass version (because that is pictured) but they sent a clear glass version- not even sure where it fits into the timeline. I really liked the green version of all the eucalyptus spearmint aromatherapy line.... I have not heard good things about any of the new candels/ soaps/ lotions in this line (brown bottles). Will have do more research but probably will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: I don’t smell eucalyptus or mint
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this but I was disappointed. I don’t smell eucaliptus or mint. It smells like soap or some artificial scent
customer_reviews.author: nancy i.

customer_reviews.title: The Scent is the best
customer_reviews.text: The essence is amazing I recommend buy this again, but buy it from the house due you will get discounts
customer_reviews.author: Yasandra santana

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the candle to purchase if you’re looking for a relaxing scent that would be appealing to females and males. The throw of the scent is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: shopper365

customer_reviews.title: This is not a Bath and Body works item. It shouldn't say it is
customer_reviews.text: This is a knockoff of Bath and Body works. For the price, I wouldnt purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: covers a lot of space!
customer_reviews.text: This candle actually covers a lot more space than I imagined. I feel like it works better than Yankee Candles. The scent is also amazing! In addition, the candle lasts a relatively long time
customer_reviews.author: purplebagel

customer_reviews.title: Old version
customer_reviews.text: The candle sent to me was an older version of the product, not the current version sold in the photos. Candle does not stick to side of container, i.e. it moves around in the glass. Would not buy this product from Amazon. Need to buy directly from Bath and Body Works for the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This product was sent to me broken. The candle did smell great but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Entringer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing relaxing smell! Doesn't last long thou!
customer_reviews.text: I looooooved everything about this candle!! The ONLY thing keeping me from giving it 5 Stars is that I felt it burned waaaay too fast!! It lasted ONLY 2 days!! A weekend!! N yes of course I burned it a total of about 16 hrs Letting it cool at times in those 2 days but STILL I feel that for the amount of money I spent on it... I should be able to burn it A LOT longer than that 😔
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda M Torres

customer_reviews.title: Need better shipping on fragile items
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the candle was shattered. I ended up puting it in a glass so to enjoy what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Lamonte smith jr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a good aroma
customer_reviews.text: This scent is great. It will literally have most if not all of your home, apartment, condo, or loft filled with this aroma. It’s very strong, but it’s smells clean.
customer_reviews.author: Work

customer_reviews.title: A Little Goes A Long Way
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes of mixing something into the air of a heavily trafficked area. Packaging; Solid glass container The silver cap has a soft rubber ring on the inside to keep it snugly in place. Scent: The label states Eucalyptus and Spearmint oils. To my nose a mix of mild melon with citrus over top. Life: A little goes a long way. Right out of the box I lit all 3 wicks and let it burn for less than ten minutes. By then it had become overpowering and passed on into several other rooms nearby. Using just one wick this candle should last quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: Wrong candle! Delivered broken! Returning ASAP
customer_reviews.text: The candle was delivered OUTSIDE of the holder and the holder itself along with the lid was completely filthy. The lid was also broken. Also - wrong candle! This is NOT what was advertised. Disappointed and already started a return. This did the opposite of relieve stress!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Kornemann

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy Stress Candle
customer_reviews.text: Sent is candle has a Fathers Day Gift. My step Dad loves it
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It does not smell like eucalyptus at all. It honestly gave me headache. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: A little too strong even..
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to fill your room with a scent, THIS IS THE ONE. I even took off a star because to me, the scent is a little too strong after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Grant

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize the scent of this candle was going ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the scent of this candle was going to be so strong. Eucalyptus and spearmint I thought would be a more subtle scent. To me it reminded me of bug spray.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Bad delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, however the delivery arrived to my house with a broken glass for both candles. I could not use the product and had to throw it away. I could not even return it since there was broken glass everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Regiane Micheloni

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite, but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Smells exquisite...just wish it didn't burn down so quickly [once it does burn down - the smell is muddled with burnt smells].
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: No cover ?
customer_reviews.text: For $20 this candle should have some type of cover. The scent is strong and should be contained. In addition if you're giving it as a gift there should be a lid. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Gunn

customer_reviews.title: ... living room in a matter of minutes with an amazing and calming scent
customer_reviews.text: This candle fills my huge living room in a matter of minutes with an amazing and calming scent, makes my house feel like a damn SPA. Cant go wrong with this candle, these candles are pricey so you might as well spend the money on a scent that is worth it, and this one is definitely it.
customer_reviews.author: Khalysee

customer_reviews.title: Packing was not good. 3 out of 4 candles arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles. I ordered 4 but 3 arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like burn it during my study sessions to shake off ...
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing and soothing scent. I like burn it during my study sessions to shake off the unconsciously built pressures. Mostly importantly, compared to other almost-no-scent candles, this one does fill my 480sqf studio in minutes. And the scent would last for a few more hours after I stop burning it. Great value for my money!
customer_reviews.author: Di Lan

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like very strong fragrances. This is my absolute favorite. It’s not too strong and so relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relax.....
customer_reviews.text: The scent is just like being in my favorite Miami spa....very relaxing without being overpowering!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: cozy calm candle
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite candles, no issues, very calming. Exactly what it claims to be & very cozy for the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Yummy fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I love candles and this one you can actually smell and fragrance is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! They not only smell great, the 3 wicks make them burn evenly and they really burn an impressively long time. They are nice enough that I've given them as gifts snd have reordered for myself.
customer_reviews.author: MRick

customer_reviews.title: Always a Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this candle more than once and I absolutely love it. Although I will say that I started ordering it straight from the Bath and Body Works website, as they have really good deals almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite candle!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite candle, by far! Makes the whole room smell great, very relaxing to breathe it in, and creates a wonderful atmosphere. highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Klein

customer_reviews.title: smells soooooooo good!!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle makes my whole apartment smell better, even when it isn't lit! Best candle for masking cannabis smell.
customer_reviews.author: JayBlaze710

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite scene
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing- fills the room with its scent. Love lighting this up when I come home and helps me relax.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: To Seller's Credit, Arrived Safely & Quickly. But Candle Reeks And Causes Headaches.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packaged (thanks seller!), but was a different jar than photographed (see photo) so prepare for that if your desire is to have a green glass candle. I bought this because I loved the Eucalyptus Spearmint scent on Bath and Body Works' lotion and body oil products. But in candle form, it's ghastly. First of all, it's completely overpowering. You don't need to light this candle for the scent to fill a room. Just take the lid off. Second, it smells artificial and cheap. I got a headache from the scent. I prefer a lighter, warmer scent, like the Paddywax Candles Apothecary Collection, Tobacco and Patchouli. That's my recommendation. Cheaper and looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jar-less candle delivered...
customer_reviews.text: Candle delivered without the glass jar.... the candle and top to the jar arrived with little glass pieces. I was still able to use the candle in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Louie

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best candles out there. Love it and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and soothing scent
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite scents and candles. The smell is powerful but not overwhelming and can fill up a whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Loera

customer_reviews.title: Smelled great, but shattered
customer_reviews.text: Candle arrived completely shattered. There was no “fragile” indication on the shipping box, so that was the likely issue. Got glass everywhere once I opened the package. Smelled great though. Hoping for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Smells divine. Not much else to say. It's a scented candle, that when lit, provides a pleasing scent. Lol
customer_reviews.author: catherine  m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great candle. I recommend you use it in a large open room. The scent is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and it last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: This candle is a favorite in my house and my office
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a favorite in my house and my office!! Calming and very relaxing. My husband says you can never over dose on Eucalyptus...

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Pretty packaging but not lasting. Smell is nice but can’t last.

customer_reviews.text: It doesn't smell as good as the ones I've bought originally from bath and body works store. I'm never buying candles online
